caller_intent: The caller, Gina Morales, wants to follow up on a previous request regarding her insurance policy and express frustration about not receiving communication from the agency in over a year. She also seeks to connect with a Spanish-speaking agent (Daisy/JC) to address her concerns.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the caller's identity and policy details (address, policyholder name 'Rogelina')
Agent checked availability of Spanish-speaking agent 'Daisy' but found her unavailable
Agent offered to transfer the call to another agent 'JC' and advised leaving a voicemail if JC was unavailable
knowledge_required: Policy review procedures for long-term customers
summary: Gina Morales, a long-term customer, expressed frustration about lack of communication from Alliance Insurance Services and requested to speak with a Spanish-speaking agent. The agent verified her policy details, checked agent availability, and transferred her to another agent while advising voicemail as a backup. The call was not resolved in this interaction but directed to the appropriate team.
